1.0.name: wordpress/eewee-twitter-hovercard
1.0.description:
Use the system "twitter hovercard" proposed by twitter wordrpess on your site. Hovercard Twitter allows you to view the profile of each @twitter_profil (hover) that you will add in the various pages / posts your website. The plugin is Extremely easy to use & offers a great value added.

More informations twitter card & content tagged with twitter card

PS: question, eewee.fr.
